title: Digital Action Receipt (DAR) â€” Payload
description: Non-authoritative JSON Schema for the DAR core payload. Canonicalization, hashing, and signing are performed over this object only. The normative definition is in dar-core.md.

dar_version.description: Version of the DAR core specification (e.g., "1.0").

action_type.description: A string identifying the category or class of the digital action.

action_id.description: A unique identifier for the digital action within the issuer's namespace.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp representing when the action reached its commit point.

type.description: The class of actor responsible for the action.

id.description: An opaque identifier for the actor.

inputs_hash.description: A cryptographic hash referencing externally stored inputs associated with the action.

outcome_hash.description: A cryptographic hash referencing externally stored outcomes/results associated with the action.
